title: WTB: T206 HOFer with Sweet Cap 350, fact 25 - still looking
author: David R

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 HOFer with Sweet Cap 350, fact 25 - still looking
posts.post_content:
I am looking for a t206 HOFer with the following two backs for my HOF back collection:

Sweet Cap 350, factory 25
Sweet Cap 350-460, factory 30 -- Got it, thanks Erick

Please email or send message if you have one.  I can buy or I have t206 HOFers to trade.

Thanks,
David R

My quest to get every t206 back with a HOFer on the front (for those that come with a HOFer) is down to the following:

Sweet Cap 350, fac 25
Drum
Red Hindu
Brown Lenox
Broadleaf 460

The Sweet Cap should be easy so I am still hoping someone has one if decent shape.  The others are really tough so if anyone has an example in any condition that won't require me to mortgage my house, I would appreciate hearing from you.  Thanks.

David R
